about_the_game: The first experimental demo for Hyperspace Deck Command features an exclusive simltation environment that might not make it into the final game. Battle your way through 3+ encounters with a randomized starter deck that draws from multiple yet-to-be-implemented game factions. This is a very early development version and the game is still subject to wide changes.
